data.question: What is the purpose of chemically crosslinking IRMOFs?
data.answer: To produce crosslinked MOFs designed to have novel properties.

data.question: What method was used to overcome the limitation of framework degradation in IRMOF-3?
data.answer: A series of pre-crosslinked NH2-BDC ligands were prepared.

data.question: True or False: The topology of the IRMOF lattice remained unaltered in the crosslinked systems.
What was the yield of IRMOF-3-AM3XL?
Why did IRMOF-3-AM4XL require activation at 150 1C for complete desolvation?
data.answer: Because activation at 105 1C resulted in significant weight loss and residual DMF.

data.question: True or False: The BET surface area of IRMOF-3-AM4XL increased by approximately 10% when activated at 150 1C compared to 105 1C.
What was the main difference observed in guest entrapment between IRMOF-3-AM4XL and the parent IRMOF-3?
data.answer: IRMOF-3-AM4XL showed notable difference in guest entrapment with robust inclusion of DMF.

data.question: True or False: The crosslinked MOFs showed enhanced thermal stability compared to IRMOF-3.
What was the purpose of using molecular dynamics calculations in the study?
data.answer: To explore possible configurations of the crosslinked ligands within the MOFs.

data.question: True or False: The PXRD patterns of all IRMOF-AMnXL samples matched the simulated IRMOF-3 powder patterns.
What was the yield of IRMOF-3-AM7XL?
How did the presence of the crosslink affect the average pore size of the IRMOF-3-AMnXL materials?
data.answer: The presence of the linkers resulted in a monotonic decrease of the average pore size with increasing tether length.

data.question: True or False: Combustion analysis data indicated that both BDC groups were structurally incorporated into the MOF lattice.
What was the main finding from the BET surface area measurements after activation at 105 1C?
data.answer: IRMOF-3-AMnXL samples showed surface areas reflective of the IRMOF structure, except for IRMOF-3-AM4XL which showed a difference depending on activation temperature.

data.question: True or False: The crosslinking approach used in this study is conceptually distinct from connecting MOPs together to obtain MOFs.
What was the effect of a single carbon difference in tether length on the encapsulation properties of the MOF?
data.answer: A single carbon difference in tether length (IRMOF-3-AM4XL) elicited a clearly measurable difference in the encapsulation properties of the MOF.

data.question: True or False: The chemical crosslinks could be resolved in the electron density maps of the crystal structures.
What was the main conclusion of the study regarding the crosslinked variant of the IRMOF system?
data.answer: The study concluded that a unique crosslinked variant of the IRMOF system was obtained, which showed a notable difference in guest entrapment for IRMOF-3-AM4XL.

data.question: True or False: The crosslinked MOFs are expected to have more highly tailored chemical and physical properties solely within the pores.
